backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing user profiles with optional avatars, reviews with optional cover images, comments, and reading‑tracker logic under access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old review and user‑profile data to new versions that include nullable cover and avatar fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_SMOKE_CHECK.md: Deployment checklist for verifying build integrity, routing, authentication, and core app functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme defining light/dark tokens, color variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the app root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router setup using TanStack Router with layout wrapper, profile modal, and development route validation.
frontend/src/components/CopyAppLinkContr: UI control enabling users to copy the app URL with clipboard support and fallback dialog.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout with navigation, user info, mobile menu, and header wrapping all pages.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button handling login/logout, error states, and identity status display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to set name and optional avatar, including validation and upload handling.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Fetches the authenticated user's profile from the backend via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Saves user profile changes and invalidates the related query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useComments.t: Loads comments for a specific review using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useLatestRevi: Fetches the latest reviews up to a specified limit.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useReview.ts: Retrieves a single review by ID from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useReviewMuta: Provides mutations for adding reviews, liking/unliking, and adding comments with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/tracker/useReadingMet: Fetches authenticated user's reading metrics from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/tracker/useTrackedBoo: Loads the authenticated user's tracked books list.
frontend/src/hooks/tracker/useTrackerMut: Mutations for adding, updating, and removing tracked books and updating reading metrics.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Builds and caches the backend actor based on identity and manages refetching dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useExternalBlobImageU: Converts an ExternalBlob into a usable image URL with direct or fallback loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, managing login state, and exposing login/clear functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ReaderDashboardPage.t: Displays user reading metrics and tracked books, showing stats or a login prompt depending on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ReadingTrackerPage.ts: Allows authenticated users to manage tracked books, update reading progress, and record pages and hours read.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewDetailPage.tsx: Shows a detailed view of a single review with likes, comments, and cover image handling, falling back if not found.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsFeedPage.tsx: Renders a reviews feed and a form for adding new reviews with optional cover images, validating and previewing uploads.
frontend/src/utils/appLink.ts: Provides browser-safe helpers to get the app's origin and full URL or return null outside browser contexts.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Provides functions to read build metadata from environment variables with fallbacks and generate a short build identifier.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into relative time strings or formatted dates based on age.
frontend/src/utils/internetIdentityConfi: Computes Internet Identity auth configuration based on environment variables and runtime origin with local and production fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/referral.ts: Generates a UTM content value from the current hostname or falls back to a default.
frontend/src/utils/uploadValidation.ts: Validates uploaded image files for type and size and provides helpers to create and revoke preview URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters (including hash-based), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, issues, and versions for a book review and reading tracker application.
